channel.title: I cant set licenses with minutes
channel.description:
Hello guys, I'm doing some apis tests for protection for a software that I'm working here in the city... I'm loving KeyAuth, but I have some issues I'd like to know if it's my error or the system's...
1 - The first problem is that I can't create licenses that are, for example, 3 minutes long, see: ![image|426x500](upload://o1PFIO0H1YtX1nYR4d7ep4IPDEl.png)
![](upload://woEbrj5ikziT4QJ54lXTxvF9uEB.png) What im doing wrong? ![](upload://dpHASDyuju9hSKz39IyIfS62xRt.png)
